title: Naughty or Nice mission: please help if possible >.<
body: Last night, my boyfriend and I logged into the game after work to play legend of the poro king. We didn't know that winning those games would cause us to lose a chance at the baron poro icon >.

replies.body: Have no fear, we may be able to help!  Have you and your boyfriend hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into each case individually.  I can't make you any guarantees but it's still early and maybe we can work something out!

Thank you so so much! He was helped super fast! Made his night when I told him to submit a ticket and he got the response! <3 Seriously you and everyone at Riot are the BEST. ^_^{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
